member.name: T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer
member.summary: Serializes and deserializes objects into and from XML documents. The enables you to control how objects are encoded into XML.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and deserialize XML documents into objects of the specified type.
member.param: The type of the object that this can serialize.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and deserialize XML documents into objects of the specified type. Specifies the default namespace for all the XML elements.
member.param: The type of the object that this can serialize.
The default namespace to use for all the XML elements.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Type[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and deserialize XML documents into object of a specified type. If a property or field returns an array, the parameter specifies objects that can be inserted into the array.
member.param: The type of the object that this can serialize.
A array of additional object types to serialize.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and deserialize XML documents into objects of the specified type. Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload can override with other classes.
member.param: The type of the object to serialize.
An .

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides,System.Type[],System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that can serialize objects of type into XML document instances, and deserialize XML document instances into objects of type . Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload overrides with other classes. This overload also specifies the default namespace for all the XML elements and the class to use as the XML root element.
member.param: The type of the object that this can serialize.
An that extends or overrides the behavior of the class specified in the parameter.
A array of additional object types to serialize.
An that defines the XML root element properties.
The default namespace of all XML elements in the XML document.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and deserialize an XML document into object of the specified type. It also specifies the class to use as the XML root element.
member.param: The type of the object that this can serialize.
An that represents the XML root element.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class using an object that maps one type to another.
member.param: An that maps one type to another.

member.returns: true if this can deserialize the object that the points to; otherwise, false.
member.param: An that points to the document to deserialize.

member.returns: The being deserialized.
member.param: The that contains the XML document to deserialize.

member.summary: Deserializes the XML document contained by the specified .
